arcade.env.grid

Class HexAgentGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.grid.AgentGrid
      • arcade.env.grid.HexAgentGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grid

    public class HexAgentGrid
extends AgentGrid
    Extension of AgentGrid for hexagonal grid.

    Each hexagon location has fifty four positions. Uses HexLocation as Location object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HexAgentGrid()
      Creates a hexagonal AgentGrid.
